coach.greeting: Hello {{name}}! I'm your personal nutrition coach.
coach.dailySummary: Here's your nutrition summary for today:
coach.caloriesSummary: You've consumed {{consumed}} of your {{target}} kcal goal.

fallbackSummary.farFromGoal: You're still far from your calorie goal. Don't forget to eat well!
fallbackSummary.onTrackGood: You're on the right track! Keep it up.
fallbackSummary.almostThere: Excellent! You're approaching your calorie goal.
fallbackSummary.exceeded: Watch out, you've exceeded your calorie goal today.

fallbackAdvice.doExercise: A little exercise would do you good!
fallbackAdvice.keepItUp: Keep it up, you're on the right track!

coach.fallbackMotivation: Every small step counts towards a healthier lifestyle.

encouragement.onTrack: Great job! You're right on track with your nutrition goals.
encouragement.slightlyOver: You're slightly over your calorie target, but don't worry - tomorrow is a new day!
encouragement.slightlyUnder: You're a bit under your target. Consider having a healthy snack.
encouragement.significantlyOver: You've exceeded your calorie goal today. Let's plan better meals for tomorrow.
encouragement.significantlyUnder: You're quite under your calorie target. Make sure you're eating enough to fuel your body.

coach.mealSuggestion: Based on your remaining calories, I suggest: {{suggestion}}
coach.waterReminder: Don't forget to stay hydrated! You've had {{glasses}} glasses of water today.
coach.weeklyReview: This week you achieved {{percent}}% of your nutrition goals. {{feedback}}
coach.streakMessage: Amazing! You're on a {{days}}-day streak of tracking your meals!

timeContext.morning: It's morning, ideal time for a balanced breakfast.
timeContext.afternoon: It's afternoon, watch out for post-lunch fatigue.
timeContext.evening: It's evening, a light dinner promotes good sleep.

advice.drinkWater: Don't forget to drink water! Aim for at least 2L per day.
advice.caloriesRemaining: You have {{calories}} kcal left to consume. Think about a balanced meal.
advice.caloriesExceeded: You've exceeded your calorie goal. How about a short walk?
advice.proteinRemaining: Still {{protein}}g of protein to reach. Try eggs, chicken, or legumes.
advice.noActivityYet: No activity yet today? Even 15 minutes make a difference!

vision.detectionComplete: Analysis complete! I detected the following items:
vision.lowConfidence: I'm not very confident about some items. Please review and correct if needed.
vision.highConfidence: I'm quite confident about this analysis.
vision.noFoodDetected: I couldn't detect any food items in this image. Please try again with a clearer photo.
vision.autoAnalysisUnavailable: Automatic analysis unavailable. Please correct manually.

mealQuality.excellent: This is an excellent, well-balanced meal!
mealQuality.good: This is a good meal choice for your goals.
mealQuality.moderate: This meal is acceptable, but could be improved.
mealQuality.poor: This meal might not align well with your nutrition goals.

weeklyImpact.maintainLoss: At this pace, you could lose ~{{loss}}kg/week
weeklyImpact.dailySurplus: You're at +{{diff}} kcal today. Balance tomorrow.
weeklyImpact.goodSurplusGain: Good caloric surplus for muscle gain (+{{diff}} kcal)
weeklyImpact.deficitForGain: Deficit of {{diff}} kcal - increase intake for muscle gain

mealTiming.morningCarbsGood: Good timing! Morning carbs provide energy for the day.
mealTiming.morningProteinGood: Good protein intake to start the day.
mealTiming.breakfastIdeal: Breakfast is ideal for complex carbs and protein.
mealTiming.lunchBalanced: Balanced lunch - perfect to maintain energy throughout the afternoon.
mealTiming.lunchLight: Light lunch - plan a healthy snack for the afternoon.
mealTiming.lunchGoodTime: Good time for a complete and balanced meal.
mealTiming.snackReasonable: Reasonable snack to avoid evening cravings.
mealTiming.snackHeavy: This snack is heavy - lighten dinner accordingly.
mealTiming.snackModerate: Moderate snack - be careful not to eat too much tonight.
mealTiming.dinnerIdeal: Ideal dinner: protein and low carbs for good sleep.
mealTiming.dinnerHeavy: Heavy dinner - avoid eating too late for digestion.
mealTiming.dinnerReasonable: Reasonable dinner - avoid quick sugars before bed.
mealTiming.lateHeavy: Late and caloric meal - may affect sleep and metabolism.
mealTiming.lateProtein: Late protein snack - acceptable for muscle recovery.
mealTiming.lateGeneral: Eating late can disrupt sleep. Prefer earlier meals.

healthReport.portionBalanced: Calorically balanced portion for a meal
healthReport.mealHighPercent: This meal represents {{percent}}% of your daily calories
healthReport.mealVeryLight: Very light meal, risk of cravings
healthReport.preferSmaller: Prefer smaller portions at next meals
healthReport.addProteinSatiety: Add a protein source for more satiety
healthReport.addProteinSuggestion: Add eggs, legumes, or lean meat
healthReport.compatibleWeightLoss: Compatible with your weight loss goal
healthReport.caloricForWeightLoss: Caloric meal for a weight loss goal
healthReport.reducePortions: Reduce portions or choose less caloric foods
healthReport.weightDecreasing: Your weight is decreasing - keep it up!
healthReport.weightIncreasing: Warning: your weight is increasing this week
healthReport.reducePortion: Slightly reduce portions to reverse the trend
healthReport.excellentProteinMuscle: Excellent protein intake for muscle building
healthReport.aim30gProtein: Aim for at least 30g of protein per meal
healthReport.caloricDeficitMuscle: You're in caloric deficit - eat more to build muscle
healthReport.addVegetables: Add vegetables for more fiber and vitamins
healthReport.burnedCalories: Well done! You burned {{calories}} kcal today
healthReport.increaseProteinRecovery: After exercise, increase protein for recovery
healthReport.addCarbsEnergy: Add complex carbs to recharge your reserves
healthReport.proteinEssentialAge: At your age, protein is essential to preserve muscle mass
healthReport.goodCalcium: Good calcium intake for bone health
healthReport.watchPortions: Even young, watch portions for good habits
healthReport.limitSimpleCarbs: Limit simple carbs and prefer fiber
healthReport.diabetesSugarWarning: ⚠️ Contains quick sugars (not recommended for diabetes)
healthReport.limitSaturatedFat: Limit saturated fats for your cholesterol
healthReport.vitaminKWarning: ⚠️ Food rich in vitamin K (caution with anticoagulants)
healthReport.consultDoctor: Consult your doctor about green vegetable consumption
healthReport.tooManyCarbs: Too many carbs ({{carbs}}g) for a keto diet
healthReport.ketoFatAdvice: In keto, prioritize fats over proteins
healthReport.varyDiet: Vary your diet - you often eat the same foods
healthReport.tryNewFoods: Try new foods for more varied nutrients
healthReport.exceededCalories: You exceed your calorie goals by {{calories}} kcal
healthReport.remainingCalories: You have {{calories}} kcal left for the rest of the day
healthReport.verdictExcellent: Excellent choice! This meal is perfectly suited to your profile.
healthReport.verdictGood: Good choice! This meal contributes positively to your goals.
healthReport.verdictNeutral: Acceptable meal. Some adjustments could improve it.
healthReport.verdictPoor: This meal is not ideal for your goals. Consider the recommendations.
healthReport.verdictBad: Warning! This meal doesn't match your nutritional profile.

recipe.generating: Creating a personalized recipe based on your ingredients and preferences...
recipe.complete: Here's a recipe tailored just for you!
recipe.noIngredientsMatch: I couldn't create a recipe with those ingredients. Try adding more options.
recipe.dietaryNote: This recipe has been adapted to your {{diet}} dietary preference.
recipe.allergenWarning: Note: Please verify all ingredients for allergens.

dietInstructions.vegan: The recipe must be 100% vegan (no animal products).
dietInstructions.vegetarian: The recipe must be vegetarian (no meat or fish).
dietInstructions.pescatarian: The recipe can include fish but no meat.
dietInstructions.keto: The recipe must be low-carb (less than 20g net carbs).
dietInstructions.paleo: The recipe must follow the paleo diet (no grains, legumes, dairy).
dietInstructions.mediterranean: The recipe must follow the Mediterranean diet.

goalInstructions.loseWeight: Prefer light recipes, high in protein and fiber, low in calories.
goalInstructions.gainMuscle: Prefer recipes high in protein (30g+ per serving) and complex carbs.
goalInstructions.improveHealth: Prefer nutritious, minimally processed foods rich in vitamins and minerals.

timeRecommendations.morning: Morning: Prefer complex carbs for energy
timeRecommendations.evening: Evening: Light meal, avoid simple carbs
timeRecommendations.late: Late: Avoid heavy meals, prefer light proteins

prompt.systemRole: You are an expert chef specializing in personalized nutrition. Generate a recipe for a {{mealType}}.
prompt.adjustReduce: IMPORTANT: The user is gaining weight but wants to lose. Suggest a LIGHT recipe.
prompt.adjustSlightReduce: Prefer a moderately caloric recipe to promote weight loss.
prompt.adjustIncrease: IMPORTANT: The user is losing weight but wants to gain. Suggest a CALORIC recipe.
prompt.adjustSlightIncrease: Prefer a fairly caloric recipe to promote weight gain.
prompt.instruction1: 1. Adapt the recipe to the user context above
prompt.instruction2: 2. Strictly respect caloric constraints if specified
prompt.instruction3: 3. Favor fresh and minimally processed ingredients
prompt.instruction4: 4. Ensure a good protein/carbs/fat balance according to the goal
prompt.jsonFormat: Respond in JSON with this exact format:
prompt.jsonDescription: Short description explaining why this recipe is suitable for the profile
prompt.jsonPersonalization: Explanation of how this recipe is adapted to the user profile
prompt.finalInstruction: Be creative but realistic. The recipe must be easy to follow and PERFECTLY adapted to the user's context.

profiling.welcome: Welcome to NutriProfile! Let's create your personalized nutrition plan.
profiling.calculatingNeeds: Calculating your daily nutritional needs based on your profile...
profiling.profileComplete: Your profile is complete! Here are your personalized recommendations:
profiling.calorieExplanation: Based on your age, weight, height, and activity level, your daily calorie target is {{calories}} kcal.
profiling.macroExplanation: Your optimal macro split is: {{protein}}g protein, {{carbs}}g carbs, {{fat}}g fat.

goalAdvice.lose: To reach your weight loss goal, we've set a moderate calorie deficit.
goalAdvice.maintain: To maintain your current weight, we've balanced your intake with your expenditure.
goalAdvice.gain: To build muscle, we've added extra calories with a focus on protein.

loseWeight.leanProtein: Prioritize lean proteins to maintain muscle mass
loseWeight.drinkWater: Drink at least 2L of water per day

general.fruitsVeggies: Consume 5 portions of fruits and vegetables daily

vegetarian.iron: Iron (combine with vitamin C for absorption)

warnings.diabetes: Monitor your carb intake and their glycemic index
warnings.hypertension: Limit your salt intake to 5g per day
warnings.allergyTrace: Watch out for traces of {{allergy}} in processed foods

nutrition.dataVerified: Nutritional values have been verified and are within normal ranges.
nutrition.outlierDetected: Some values seem unusual and may need verification.
nutrition.missingData: Some nutritional information is missing. Using estimated values.

proteinStatus.low: Your protein intake is below target. Consider adding more lean proteins.
proteinStatus.optimal: Your protein intake is on target.
proteinStatus.high: Your protein intake is above target.

carbStatus.low: Your carb intake is low. Consider adding complex carbohydrates.
carbStatus.optimal: Your carb intake is well balanced.
carbStatus.high: Your carb intake is high. Consider reducing refined carbs.

fatStatus.low: Your fat intake is low. Don't forget healthy fats are essential.
fatStatus.high: Your fat intake is above target. Focus on healthy fat sources.

consensus.foodDisagreement: Strong disagreement: {{unique}} unique foods, {{common}} in common
